assignments.title: Science Explorer: The Seasons
assignments.description:
##LEARNING##
The Earth has four main seasons: Spring, Summer, Autumn (also called Fall), and Winter. Each season brings different weather and changes to nature. For example, flowers bloom in Spring, Summer is usually the hottest, leaves change colors in Autumn, and Winter is often cold with snow.

##QUIZ##
1. How many main seasons does Earth have? A) Two B) Three C) Four* D) Five 2. Which season is known for flowers blooming? A) Summer B) Autumn C) Winter D) Spring* 3. In which season do leaves often change color and fall from trees? A) Spring B) Summer C) Autumn* D) Winter 4. Which season is usually the coldest? A) Spring B) Summer C) Autumn D) Winter* 5. Which season is usually the hottest? A) Spring B) Summer* C) Autumn D) Winter 6. What kind of weather might you expect in Winter? A) Hot and sunny B) Warm and rainy C) Cold and snowy* D) Mild and breezy
